name: This is Not a Game (Frisk17)
description:
THIS GAME IS MY SUBMISSION FOR WEEKLY GAME JAM WEEK 160

QUICK NOTE:

This game is intentionally hard and punishing and even unfair at times so if you are a person who doesn't like that kinda games I wouldn't recommend you playing it. Good luck (^^)

CONTROLS:

They are mentioned in the game but if you wanna see it here:

  • Left and right arrow key to move horizontally
  • C to jump
  • Z to interact in a dialogue or skip the typing animation

The longer you hold C the higher you'll jump

I HOPE YOU LIKE THIS (^^)
